entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
